SELECT YEAR, ACCT_NO , ACCT_NM , SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT YEAR, ACCT_NO , ACCT_NM , SUM_AMT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY YEAR ORDER BY SUM_AMT DESC) AS SUM_AMT_NUM_DESC
FROM ( SELECT YEAR, ACCT_NO , ACCT_NM , SUM(AMT-FEE ) SUM_AMT, FROM( SELECT LEFT(DE_DM ,4) AS YEAR, TD.ACCT_NO , TA.ACCT_NM , TD.DE_NO , TD.AMT , TD.FEE , TD.CAN_AT FROM TB_DEDTLS TD LEFT JOIN TB_ACCTINFO TA ON TD.ACCT_NO = TA.ACCT_NO WHERE TD.CAN_AT = 'N' ) GROUP BY YEAR, ACCT_NO , ACCT_NM ) ) WHERE SUM_AMT_NUM_DESC = 1 ORDER BY YEAR DESC
SELECT DISTINCT LEFT(DE_DM ,4) AS YEAR, TA.ACCT_NO FROM TB_DEDTLS TD LEFT JOIN TB_ACCTINFO TA ON TA.ACCT_NO = TD.ACCT_NO WHERE CAN_AT = 'N' ORDER BY LEFT(DE_DM ,4) DESC , TA.ACCT_NO

SELECT YEAR, TB.BR_NM, TB.BR_CODE, SUM(AMT-FEE) AS SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT LEFT(DE_DM ,4) AS YEAR, TD.ACCT_NO, TD.AMT, TD.FEE, TA.BR_CODE FROM TB_DEDTLS TD LEFT JOIN TB_ACCTINFO TA ON TD.ACCT_NO = TA.ACCT_NO WHERE TD.CAN_AT='N' ) TDTA LEFT JOIN TB_BRINFO TB ON TDTA.BR_CODE = TB.BR_CODE GROUP BY YEAR, TB.BR_NM , TB.BR_CODE ORDER BY YEAR DESC, SUM_AMT DESC
